attributes.action: Stop the unnecessary euthanasia of healthy animals.
attributes.additional_details:
I strongly disagree with the veterinary procedure of euthanasia performed upon perfectly healthy animals. I believe it is an action which the UK is widely unaware of, which occurs on a day to day basis, unnecessary killing thousands of innocent, healthy pets yearly.
I would like the government to take action against this, and stop cruelty that is the unnecessary euthanasia of animals.
